 Two ways to express substitution of ` A ` for ` x ` in ` ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-1995.)
statement:
alexeq.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
alexeq $p |- ( A. x ( x = A -> ph ) <-> E. x ( x = A /\ ph ) ) $.
$d A x $.
